name: @decentral.ee/rdai
description: Redeemable Dai with detached principal and interests

scripts.sync:submodules: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.bootstrap: npm ci && lerna bootstrap --ci && npm run link-parent-bin
scripts.bootstrap:noci: npm install && lerna bootstrap --no-ci && npm run link-parent-bin
scripts.reset: npm run reset:package-json && npm run reset:node_modules
scripts.reset:package-json: rm -f package-lock.json && npx lerna exec -- rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.reset:node_modules: npx lerna exec -- rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.link-parent-bin: for i in ethereum front;do link-parent-bin -c $i || exit 1;done
